text.v: Hóa đơn mua hàng nhập khẩu

processing.text:
declare @q nvarchar(4000), @user int, @admin bit, @language char(1), @sys varchar(32), @m int, @trackedLocation bit, @trackedLot bit &ControlLocationLotLoading; select @trackedLocation = @$location, @trackedLot = @$lot end else begin select @trackedLocation = cast(rtrim(val) as bit) from options where name = 'm_kt_td_vitri_yn' select @trackedLot = cast(rtrim(val) as bit) from options where name = 'm_kt_td_lo_yn' end select @m = character_maximum_length from information_schema.columns where table_name = 'phlsx' and column_name = 'so_lsx' select @admin = @@admin, @user = @@userID, @language = @@language, @sys = '@@sysDatabaseName'
update @@table set so_lsx = space(@m - len(rtrim(so_lsx))) + rtrim(so_lsx)
create table #r (ma_vt varchar(32), ten_vt nvarchar(512), dvt nvarchar(32), he_so numeric(19, 4), ma_kho varchar(32), ma_vi_tri varchar(32), ma_lo varchar(32), so_luong numeric(19, 4), gia_nt0 numeric(19, 4), tien_nt0 numeric(19, 4), gia_nt3 numeric(19, 4), tien_nt3 numeric(19, 4), ma_thue_nk varchar(32), thue_suat_nk numeric(5, 2), tk_thue_nk varchar(32), nk_nt numeric(19, 4), ma_thue_ttdb varchar(32), thue_suat_ttdb numeric(5, 2), tk_thue_ttdb varchar(32), ttdb_nt numeric(19, 4), ma_thue varchar(32), thue_suat numeric(5, 2), tk_thue varchar(32), thue_nt numeric(19, 4), tk_vt varchar(32), ma_vv varchar(32), ma_bp varchar(32), so_lsx varchar(32), ma_sp varchar(32), ma_hd varchar(32), ma_phi varchar(32), ma_ku varchar(32), gia_ton int, vi_tri_yn bit, lo_yn bit, tao_lo bit, thue_cn bit, nhieu_dvt bit, sua_tk_vt bit, ref varchar(32), stt int &PMDetailImportFields.Create;)
select @q = 'insert into #r(ma_vt, ten_vt, dvt, he_so, ma_kho, ma_vi_tri, ma_lo, so_luong, gia_nt0, tien_nt0, gia_nt3, tien_nt3,' select @q = @q + 'ma_thue_nk, thue_suat_nk, tk_thue_nk, nk_nt, ma_thue_ttdb, thue_suat_ttdb, tk_thue_ttdb, ttdb_nt, ma_thue, thue_suat, tk_thue, thue_nt,' select @q = @q + 'tk_vt, ma_vv, ma_bp, so_lsx, ma_sp, ma_hd, ma_phi, ma_ku, gia_ton, vi_tri_yn, lo_yn, tao_lo, thue_cn, nhieu_dvt, sua_tk_vt, ref, stt&PMDetailImportFields.Process;)' select @q = @q + ' select a.ma_vt, b.ten_vt%l, case when isnull(a.dvt, '''') <> '''' then a.dvt else b.dvt end as dvt, 1 as he_so,' select @q = @q + 'case when isnull(a.ma_kho, '''') <> '''' then a.ma_kho else b.ma_kho end as ma_kho,' select @q = @q + case when @trackedLocation <> 0 then 'case when isnull(a.ma_vi_tri, '''') <> '''' then a.ma_vi_tri else b.ma_vi_tri end as ma_vi_tri,' else ''''',' end select @q = @q + 'a.ma_lo, so_luong, gia_nt0, tien_nt0, gia_nt3, tien_nt3,' select @q = @q + 'a.ma_thue_nk, case when isnull(a.ma_thue_nk, '''') <> '''' then d.thue_suat else 0 end as thue_suat_nk, case when a.tk_thue_nk = '''' then case when isnull(a.ma_thue_nk, '''') <> '''' then d.tk_thue else '''' end else a.tk_thue_nk end as tk_thue_nk, a.nk_nt,' select @q = @q + 'a.ma_thue_ttdb, case when isnull(a.ma_thue_ttdb, '''') <> '''' then e.thue_suat else 0 end as thue_suat_ttdb, case when a.tk_thue_ttdb = '''' then case when isnull(a.ma_thue_ttdb, '''') <> '''' then e.tk_thue else '''' end else a.tk_thue_ttdb end as tk_thue_ttdb, a.ttdb_nt,' select @q = @q + 'a.ma_thue, case when isnull(a.ma_thue, '''') <> '''' then f.thue_suat else 0 end as thue_suat, case when a.tk_thue = '''' then case when isnull(a.ma_thue, '''') <> '''' then f.tk_thue_no3 else '''' end else a.tk_thue end as tk_thue, a.thue_nt,' select @q = @q + 'case when isnull(a.tk_vt, '''') <> '''' then a.tk_vt else b.tk_vt end,' select @q = @q + 'ma_vv, ma_bp, so_lsx, ma_sp, ma_hd,' select @q = @q + 'ma_phi, ma_ku, b.gia_ton, cast(0 as bit) as vi_tri_yn, ' select @q = @q + case when @trackedLot <> 0 then 'b.lo_yn, ' else '0, ' end + 'b.tao_lo, g.tk_cn as thue_cn, b.nhieu_dvt, b.sua_tk_vt, '''', a.stt ' select @q = @q + '&PMDetailImportFields.Process;' select @q = @q + ' from @@table a left join dmvt b on a.ma_vt = b.ma_vt left join dmkho c on b.ma_kho = c.ma_kho left join dmthuenk d on a.ma_thue_nk = d.ma_thue left join dmthuettdb e on a.ma_thue_ttdb = e.ma_thue left join dmthue f on a.ma_thue = f.ma_thue left join dmtk g on a.tk_thue = g.tk' exec sp_executesql @q
update #r set he_so = b.he_so from #r a join vdmvtqddvt b on (a.ma_vt = b.ma_vt or b.ma_vt = '*') and a.dvt = b.dvt where a.nhieu_dvt = 1 if @trackedLocation <> 0 update #r set vi_tri_yn = 1 from #r a join dmvitri b on a.ma_kho = b.ma_kho update #r set tk_vt = c.tk_dl from #r a join dmkho b on a.ma_kho = b.ma_kho&SiteKey;join dmvt c on a.ma_vt = c.ma_vt where b.dai_ly_yn = 1 and b.ma_dvcs = @ma_dvcs and c.tk_dl <> ''
update #r set ma_thue_nk = b.ma_thue_nk, thue_suat_nk = c.thue_suat, tk_thue_nk = case when a.tk_thue_nk = '' then c.tk_thue else a.tk_thue_nk end from #r a join dmvt b on a.ma_vt = b.ma_vt join dmthuenk c on b.ma_thue_nk = c.ma_thue where a.ma_thue_nk = '' update #r set ma_thue = b.ma_thue, thue_suat = c.thue_suat, tk_thue = case when a.tk_thue = '' then c.tk_thue_no3 else a.tk_thue end from #r a join dmvt b on a.ma_vt = b.ma_vt join dmthue c on b.ma_thue = c.ma_thue where a.ma_thue = ''
if not exists(select 1 from #r where dvt <> '') update #r set ref = ref + '1' else update #r set ref = ref + case when a.dvt = '' or b.dvt is not null or c.dvt is not null then '1' else '0' end from #r a left join vdmvtqddvt b on a.dvt = b.dvt and (a.ma_vt = b.ma_vt or b.ma_vt = '*') left join dmvt c on a.ma_vt = c.ma_vt and a.dvt = c.dvt if not exists(select 1 from #r where ma_kho <> '') update #r set ref = ref + '1' else update #r set ref = ref + case when a.ma_kho = '' or b.ma_kho is not null then '1' else '0' end from #r a left join dmkho b on a.ma_kho = b.ma_kho and b.ma_dvcs = @ma_dvcs&SiteKey; if not exists(select 1 from #r where ma_vi_tri <> '') update #r set ref = ref + '1' else update #r set ref = ref + case when a.ma_vi_tri = '' or b.ma_vi_tri is not null then '1' else '0' end from #r a left join dmvitri b on a.ma_kho = b.ma_kho and a.ma_vi_tri = b.ma_vi_tri if not exists(select 1 from #r where ma_lo <> '') update #r set ref = ref + '1' else update #r set ref = ref + case when a.ma_lo = '' or b.ma_lo is not null then '1' else '0' end from #r a left join dmlo b on a.ma_vt = b.ma_vt and a.ma_lo = b.ma_lo
if not exists(select 1 from #r where ma_thue_nk <> '') update #r set ref = ref + '1' else update #r set ref = ref + case when a.ma_thue_nk = '' or b.ma_thue is not null then '1' else '0' end from #r a left join dmthuenk b on a.ma_thue_nk = b.ma_thue if not exists(select 1 from #r where tk_thue_nk <> '') update #r set ref = ref + '1' else update #r set ref = ref + case when a.tk_thue_nk = '' or b.tk is not null then '1' else '0' end from #r a left join dmtk b on a.tk_thue_nk = b.tk and b.loai_tk = 1
if not exists(select 1 from #r where ma_thue_ttdb <> '') update #r set ref = ref + '1' else update #r set ref = ref + case when a.ma_thue_ttdb = '' or b.ma_thue is not null then '1' else '0' end from #r a left join dmthuettdb b on a.ma_thue_ttdb = b.ma_thue if not exists(select 1 from #r where tk_thue_ttdb <> '') update #r set ref = ref + '1' else update #r set ref = ref + case when a.tk_thue_ttdb = '' or b.tk is not null then '1' else '0' end from #r a left join dmtk b on a.tk_thue_ttdb = b.tk and b.loai_tk = 1
if not exists(select 1 from #r where ma_thue <> '') update #r set ref = ref + '1' else update #r set ref = ref + case when a.ma_thue = '' or b.ma_thue is not null then '1' else '0' end from #r a left join dmthue b on a.ma_thue = b.ma_thue if not exists(select 1 from #r where tk_thue <> '') update #r set ref = ref + '1' else update #r set ref = ref + case when a.tk_thue = '' or b.tk is not null then '1' else '0' end from #r a left join dmtk b on a.tk_thue = b.tk and b.loai_tk = 1
if not exists(select 1 from #r where tk_vt <> '') update #r set ref = ref + '1' else update #r set ref = ref + case when a.tk_vt = '' or b.tk is not null then '1' else '0' end from #r a left join dmtk b on a.tk_vt = b.tk and b.loai_tk = 1
&CheckImportUserDefinedFields;
select '' as message, 'this.frameElement.result = @@result;parent.set$Grid$ImportResult(this.frameElement);' as script select ma_vt, ten_vt, rtrim(dvt) as dvt, he_so, rtrim(ma_kho) as ma_kho, rtrim(ma_vi_tri) as ma_vi_tri, ma_lo, so_luong, gia_nt0, tien_nt0, gia_nt3, tien_nt3, ma_thue_nk, thue_suat_nk, tk_thue_nk, nk_nt, ma_thue_ttdb, thue_suat_ttdb, tk_thue_ttdb, ttdb_nt, ma_thue, thue_suat, tk_thue, thue_nt, rtrim(tk_vt) as tk_vt, ma_vv, ma_bp, so_lsx, ma_sp, ma_hd, ma_phi, ma_ku, gia_ton, vi_tri_yn, lo_yn, tao_lo&PMDetailImportFields.Process;, thue_cn, nhieu_dvt, sua_tk_vt, ref from #r order by stt
return
